<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- SystemZLongBranch.cpp - Branch lengthening for SystemZ ------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass makes sure that all branches are in range.  There are several ways</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in which this could be done.  One aggressive approach is to assume that all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches are in range and successively replace those that turn out not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be in range with a longer form (branch relaxation).  A simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementation is to continually walk through the function relaxing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches until no more changes are needed and a fixed point is reached.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, in the pathological worst case, this implementation is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// quadratic in the number of blocks; relaxing branch N can make branch N-1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// go out of range, which in turn can make branch N-2 go out of range,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and so on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An alternative approach is to assume that all branches must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// converted to their long forms, then reinstate the short forms of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches that, even under this pessimistic assumption, turn out to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in range (branch shortening).  This too can be implemented as a function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// walk that is repeated until a fixed point is reached.  In general,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the result of shortening is not as good as that of relaxation, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shortening is also quadratic in the worst case; shortening branch N</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can bring branch N-1 in range of the short form, which in turn can do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same for branch N-2, and so on.  The main advantage of shortening</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is that each walk through the function produces valid code, so it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible to stop at any point after the first walk.  The quadraticness</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could therefore be handled with a maximum pass count, although the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// question then becomes: what maximum count should be used?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On SystemZ, long branches are only needed for functions bigger than 64k,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which are relatively rare to begin with, and the long branch sequences</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are actually relatively cheap.  It therefore doesn&#39;t seem worth spending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// much compilation time on the problem.  Instead, the approach we take is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (1) Work out the address that each block would have if no branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     need relaxing.  Exit the pass early if all branches are in range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     according to this assumption.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (2) Work out the address that each block would have if all branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     need relaxing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (3) Walk through the block calculating the final address of each instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     and relaxing those that need to be relaxed.  For backward branches,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     this check uses the final address of the target block, as calculated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     earlier in the walk.  For forward branches, this check uses the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     address of the target block that was calculated in (2).  Both checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     give a conservatively-correct range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/systemz/systemz-h">SystemZ.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunction.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionpass-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunctionPass.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h">llvm/Support/ErrorHandling.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/terminatorinfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/terminatorinfo/#a341a1af1b8e46a130aef2bb74a909447">TerminatorInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this terminator is a relaxable branch, this points to the branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, otherwise it is null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/terminatorinfo/#ae0b1ee5d0795b42db82c70b80fe5bd3c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/terminatorinfo/#ae0b1ee5d0795b42db82c70b80fe5bd3c">Branch</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/systemzlongbranch/#ad25e3ce18dd0002c329f535f430a122a">SystemZLongBranch::ID</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/#ad1a9885168c5077b49b74b0df00ccc34"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/#ad1a9885168c5077b49b74b0df00ccc34">MaxBackwardRange</a> = 0x10000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/#a20aa5a62259937f21361e01126656520"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/#a20aa5a62259937f21361e01126656520">MaxForwardRange</a> = 0xfffe;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="#a4710b56612132673eefcf37dcfca29aa"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#af807c9595d50b45c0008924c4679c85c">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/systemzlongbranch/#aa45f0249e5f699048e88c43c41740c6e">SystemZLongBranch</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/genericcycleimpl-h/#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d">DEBUG&#95;TYPE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SystemZ Long Branch&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Position describes the state immediately before Block.  Update Block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accordingly and move Position to the end of the block&#39;s non-terminator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">void <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/systemzlongbranch/#aa45f0249e5f699048e88c43c41740c6e">SystemZLongBranch</a>::skipNonTerminators(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/blockposition/#a49cd074d8e5e014767864fc38e1c5607">BlockPosition</a> &amp;Position,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-systemzlongbranch-cpp-/mbbinfo/#afd64b121a20c5dd6cd6509b145201cb1">MBBInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Alignment) &gt; Position.KnownBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When calculating the address of Block, we need to conservatively</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assume that Block had the worst possible misalignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Position.Address +=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (Block.Alignment.value() - (uint64&#95;t(1) &lt;&lt; Position.KnownBits));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Position.KnownBits = Log2(Block.Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Align the addresses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Position.Address = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Position.Address, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>.Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record the block&#39;s position.</span></CodeLine>
